thread.title: ResCap Liquidating Trust Announces Posting of Q4 2017 Financial Statements

author: cnbc.com
title: ResCap Liquidating Trust Announces Posting of Q4 2017 Financial Statements

organizations.name: trust beneficiary tax worksheet for u.s. federal income tax

text:
MINNEAPOLIS, Feb. 20, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- The ResCap Liquidating Trust (the "Trust") announced its unaudited Consolidated Financial Statements, as of and for the period ended December 31, 2017, along with its quarterly Beneficiary Letter and tax letter have been posted to the Trust's website, rescapliquidatingtrust.com .
In addition, the 2017 Trust Beneficiary Tax Worksheet for U.S. Federal Income Tax has been posted to the Trust's website. The 2017 Tax worksheets for State Specific Income Tax Purposes for Beneficiaries of Trust Units for the calendar year 2017 will be posted at a later date after all Trust state tax returns have been completed.
View original content: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/rescap-liquidating-trust-announces-posting-of-q4-2017-financial-statements-300601560.html
SOURCE ResCap Liquidating Trust
